summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons Special Housing Unit review roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 6, 2019. It lists inmates in special housing, their status, and next review dates. Jeffrey Edward Epstein is listed as an inmate pending classification, with a next review date of August 12, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate 76318-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with an IA Date of July 29, 2019, status 'AD PENDING CLASSIFICATION', and a next review date of August 12, 2019.

events.title: Epstein placed in Special Housing Unit

events.title: Scheduled review for Epstein
events.description: Scheduled 14-day review for Jeffrey Edward Epstein's status in the Special Housing Unit.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Edward Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York as of August 6, 2019.
He was held in the Special Housing Unit with a status of 'AD PENDING CLASSIFICATION' as of July 29, 2019.
His next scheduled review in the Special Housing Unit was set for August 12, 2019.
The document is a routine BOP administrative roster showing Epstein among many other inmates in special housing.
